question: The vending machines sell crackers for 40 cents and cookies for 50 cents. William spent $14 and got 7 bags of crackers and had 5% of his money left in change. How many cookies did he buy?
answer:
William got $0.7 in change because $14*5/100 = <<14*5/100=0.7>>0.7
William spent $13.3 because 14 - 0.7 = <<14-0.7=13.3>>13.3
William spent $2.8 on crackers because 7*0.4 = <<7*0.4=2.8>>2.8
William spent 10.5 on cookies because 13.3 - 2.8 = <<13.3-2.8=10.5>>10.5
William bought 21 cookies because 10.5 / 0.5 = <<21=21>>21
#### 21
